author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 35-year-old lorry owner-cum-driver was killed in an accident near Thoppur on Tuesday night.

The incident occurred when the axle of the lorry laden with bricks snapped. The lorry lost control and over turned injuring the victim Shaktivel. Shaktivel succumbed to injuries on the way to Salem Government Medical College Hospital.
title: Killed in accident
